citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on 30-MAR-
2023.
The Inspector arrived at the facility and called and texted known contact numbers with no response. The facility's
perimeter gate was locked, so the Inspector waited for 30 minutes outside the gate then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on 30-MAR-
2023. 
The Inspector arrived at the facility and called and texted known contact numbers with no response.  The facility's 
perimeter gate was locked, so the Inspector waited for 30 minutes outside the gate then left the premises. 
 
 
 
End Section
